item.description:
Join Mongo in introducing Free State Ale to discerning beer drinkers and freedom fighters in the Granite State.

Saturday, November 29 from 4 to 7 p.m. in Concord. Directions/address below.

The address is 119 Old Turnpike Road 3G, Concord 03301. It's an industrial park and a bit difficult to find, but not busy on a Saturday. The brewery is across from South End Auto.

The Open House will be from 4 pm to 7 pm or perhaps a bit later. We expect to have the Combat Ale and also the Imperial Blonde available, possibly a pizza or two. Keeping our phone number available (603 617 2409) sometimes helps stranded travelers! We're very convenient to the Manchester Road exit off 93.

Letâ€™s show our support for this new start-up business owned and managed by FSP early movers.
item.name: Introducing Free State Ale to Discerning Beer Drinkers
